sentences.english: Souvenir condoms rolled out for UK royal wedding.

sentences.english: Telecom stocks have potential to become the next market focus.
sentences.chinese: 电信板块很有可能成为下一个热炒的板块。

sentences.english: Now just, stir-fry by heat, " unite to appear on the market " also is prospect can You.
sentences.chinese: 而现在正被热炒的“联合上市”也是前景堪忧。

sentences.english: Since recently several days, network sensationalizing this matter.
sentences.chinese: 最近几天以来，网络正热炒此事。
